title: Kellogg's Cereal Boxes Title fonts?
content:
Can anyone help me identify the typeface used by Kellogg's on the box for Rice Krispies, and Mini Wheats? 2 samples below. Thanks!

[Rice Krispies](http://web.archive.org/web/20100722055555/http:/www.bafco.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/08/rice_krispies.jpg)  
 [Mini Wheats](http://web.archive.org/web/20100722055555/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%253A%252F%252Fwww.epiceriedirect.com%252Ffr%252Flookproduct.php%253Fidpro%253D9160)
author: Nunymare

comments.content:
Rice Krispies looks like Futura Condensed, maybe Bold or Heavy.

- Lex

I am sure they are based on fonts, and I do not know how old this packaging is but Charlie Hughes drew/redrew many/almost all of the cereal box "logos." Some are obviously drawn, some amended fonts... if that helps.

I am sure somebody will give you the core identity.

Michael
